title: DeepAR: Probabilistic Forecasting with Autoregressive Recurrent Networks

tldr.text: DeepAR is proposed, a methodology for producing accurate probabilistic forecasts, based on training an auto regressive recurrent network model on a large number of related time series, with accuracy improvements of around 15% compared to state-of-the-art methods.
